trans-unit.source: Provides a file system implementation of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de sistema de arquivos da <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebRequest class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>`abstract` base class for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: A classe FileWebRequest implementa o <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> `abstract` classe base para URIs Uniform Resource Identifier () que usam o `file://` esquema solicitar arquivos locais.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Não use o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to initialize new instances of the FileWebRequest class.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para inicializar novas instâncias de classe FileWebRequest.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the URI scheme is `file://`, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method returns a FileWebRequest object.
trans-unit.target: Se o esquema URI é `file://`, o <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>método retorna um objeto FileWebRequest.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method makes a synchronous request for the file specified in the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.RequestUri%2A> property and returns a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> object that contains the response.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>método faz uma solicitação síncrona para o arquivo especificado no <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.RequestUri%2A>propriedade e retorna um <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>objeto que contém a resposta.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.RequestUri%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can make an asynchronous request for the file using the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer uma solicitação assíncrona para o arquivo usando o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>e <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you want to write data to a file, the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance to write to.
trans-unit.target: Quando você quiser gravar dados em um arquivo, o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>método retorna um <xref:System.IO.Stream>instância gravasse.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> methods provide asynchronous access to the write data stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>e <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>métodos fornecem acesso assíncrono para o fluxo de dados de gravação.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebRequest class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.
trans-unit.target: A classe FileWebRequest depende de <xref:System.IO.File>classe para tratamento de erros e segurança de acesso ao código.</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref> classe a partir de instâncias especificadas de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classes.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface para a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the information that is required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém as informações que são necessários para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objeto que contém a origem do fluxo serializado que está associado com o novo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: Cancela uma solicitação para um recurso de Internet.

trans-unit.source: The Abort method cancels a request to a resource.
trans-unit.target: O método Abort cancela uma solicitação para um recurso.

trans-unit.source: After a request is canceled, calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method causes a <xref:System.Net.WebException> with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Depois que uma solicitação for cancelada, chamando o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, ou o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>método faz com que um <xref:System.Net.WebException>com a <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>.</xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus> </xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebException> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** esse membro gera informações de rastreamento, quando você habilita o rastreamento de rede em seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [rastreamento de rede no .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to use to write data.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação assíncrona para um <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto a ser usado para gravar dados.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The BeginGetRequestStream method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data to a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginGetRequestStream inicia uma solicitação assíncrona para um fluxo usado para enviar dados para um recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method to return the request stream.
trans-unit.target: O método de retorno de chamada que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>Delegar usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>método para retornar o fluxo da solicitação.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> </xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém informações de estado para esta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a solicitação assíncrona.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.Method*> property is `GET` and the application writes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.Method*>é de propriedade `GET` e o aplicativo grava no fluxo.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.Method*>

trans-unit.source: The stream is being used by a previous call to BeginGetRequestStream.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo está sendo usado por uma chamada anterior para BeginGetRequestStream.

trans-unit.source: No write stream is available.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum fluxo de gravação está disponível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref> was aborted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref> foi anulada.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação assíncrona para um recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> method to return the actual <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>.
trans-unit.target: O método de retorno de chamada assíncrono que implementa o <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representante usa o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>método para retornar o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> real</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> </xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegar.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém informações de estado para esta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a solicitação assíncrona.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The stream is already in use by a previous call to BeginGetResponse.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo já está em uso por uma chamada anterior para BeginGetResponse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref> was aborted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref> foi anulada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the connection group for the request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do grupo de conexão para a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionGroupName property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ConnectionGroupName atualmente não é usada, a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The name of the connection group for the request.
trans-unit.target: O nome do grupo de conexão para a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content length of the data being sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comprimento do conteúdo dos dados que estão sendo enviados.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of request data being sent.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes de dados de solicitação que está sendo enviados.

trans-unit.source: ContentLength is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: ContentLength é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content type of the data being sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de conteúdo dos dados que estão sendo enviados.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property contains the media type of the data being sent.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ContentType contém o tipo de mídia dos dados sendo enviados.

trans-unit.source: This is typically the MIME encoding of the content.
trans-unit.target: Isso é normalmente MIME codificação do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ContentType atualmente não é usada, a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The content type of the data being sent.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de conteúdo dos dados que estão sendo enviados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials that are associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as credenciais que estão associadas esta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class does not authenticate requests for files from the local file system, it ignores the contents, if any, of the Credentials property.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe não autenticar solicitações de arquivos do sistema de arquivos local, que ignora o conteúdo, se houver, da propriedade credenciais.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: Authentication for <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> is handled by the access control lists for the file resource in the underlying file system.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação para <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>é tratado pelas listas de controle de acesso para o recurso de arquivo no sistema de arquivos subjacente.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> that contains the authentication credentials that are associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.ICredentials>que contém as credenciais de autenticação que estão associadas esta solicitação.</xref:System.Net.ICredentials>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous request for a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that the application uses to write data.
trans-unit.target: Termina uma solicitação assíncrona para um <xref:System.IO.Stream>instância que o aplicativo usa para gravar dados.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The EndGetRequestStream method completes an asynchronous stream request that was started by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndGetRequestStream conclui uma solicitação de fluxo assíncrono que foi iniciada pelo <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid timing issues with garbage collection, be sure to close the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method on the stream returned by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para evitar problemas de sincronização com a coleta de lixo, certifique-se de fechar o fluxo de resposta chamando o <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>o fluxo retornado pelo método de <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>método depois de chamar o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the pending request for a stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a solicitação pendente para um fluxo.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that the application uses to write data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.Stream>que o aplicativo usa para gravar dados de objeto.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous request for a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Termina uma solicitação assíncrona para um recurso do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The EndGetResponse method completes an asynchronous request for a file system resource that was started with the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndGetResponse conclui uma solicitação assíncrona para um recurso do sistema de arquivo que foi iniciada com o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the pending request for a response.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a solicitação pendente por uma resposta.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> that contains the response from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>que contém a resposta do recurso do sistema do arquivo.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: Any objects that are included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos que estão incluídos no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automaticamente são rastreadas e serializado pelo formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para popular com dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que especifica o destino desta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for writing data to the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto para a gravação de dados para o recurso do sistema de arquivos.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The GetRequestStream method provides synchronous access to the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetRequestStream fornece acesso síncrono a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: For asynchronous access, use the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar assíncrona, use o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>e <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> for writing data to the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.Stream>para gravação de dados para o recurso do sistema de arquivos.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The request times out.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação expire.

trans-unit.source: Returns a response to a file system request.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma resposta a uma solicitação de sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: The GetResponse method returns a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object that contains the response from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: O método GetResponse retorna um <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>objeto que contém a resposta do recurso do sistema do arquivo.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: The GetResponse method provides synchronous access to the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetResponse fornece acesso síncrono a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: For asynchronous access, use the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar assíncrona, use o <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>e <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> that contains the response from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>que contém a resposta do recurso do sistema do arquivo.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: The request timed out.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação atingiu o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the name/value pairs that are associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção dos pares de nome/valor que estão associados com a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The Headers property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade cabeçalhos atualmente não é usada, a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> that contains header name/value pairs associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>que contém pares de nome/valor de cabeçalho associados a esta solicitação.</xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the protocol method used for the request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o método de protocolo usado para a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The Method property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do método no momento não é usada, a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The protocol method to use in this request.
trans-unit.target: O método de protocolo a ser usado nesta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preauthenticate a request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve pré-autenticam uma solicitação.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The PreAuthenticate property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade PreAuthenticate atualmente não é usada, a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to preauthenticate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para pré-autenticar; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the network proxy to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o proxy de rede a ser usado para esta solicitação.

trans-unit.source: This property is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está reservada para uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The Proxy property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de Proxy atualmente não é usada, a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> that indicates the network proxy to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>que indica que o proxy de rede a ser usado para esta solicitação.</xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>

trans-unit.source: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de recursos uniforme (URI) da solicitação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the URI of the request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Uri>que contém o URI da solicitação.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the required data to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados serializados para o <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém o destino do fluxo serializado que está associado com o novo <xref href="System.Net.FileWebRequest"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o período de tempo até que a solicitação expire.

trans-unit.source: A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out.
trans-unit.target: Uma consulta de sistema de nome de domínio (DNS) pode levar até 15 segundos para retornar ou tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set Timeout to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request.
trans-unit.target: Se a solicitação contém um nome de host que requer que a resolução e definir tempo limite para um valor menor que 15 segundos, pode levar 15 segundos ou mais antes de um <xref:System.Net.WebException>é gerada para indicar um tempo limite em sua solicitação.</xref:System.Net.WebException>

trans-unit.source: The time, in milliseconds, until the request times out, or the value <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName> to indicate that the request does not time out.
trans-unit.target: O tempo, em milissegundos, até que a solicitação expire, ou o valor <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName> para indicar que a solicitação não expira.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than or equal to zero and is not <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que ou igual a zero e não é <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre gera um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The UseDefaultCredentials property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UseDefaultCredentials é fornecida somente para compatibilidade com outras implementações do <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>e <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>classes.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: There is no reason to use UseDefaultCredentials.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum motivo para usar UseDefaultCredentials.

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre gera um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Default credentials are not supported for file Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs).
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para credenciais padrão para o arquivo Uniform Resource Identifier (URIs).
